name: Pixality
description:
PIXALITY

Pixality is a game that you control two characters that opposite of each other at the same time.

  

Solve puzzles jump platform to platform and reach end in the both sides.

Credits:

  • Arda Aksit
  • Orcun Manap
  • Emirhan Akpinar
  • Kartal Batin Yuksel
